scripts.deploy: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployMonad.s.sol --rpc-url $RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --verify --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY && cd .. && node scripts/update-config.js
scripts.deploy:keystore: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployMonad.s.sol --rpc-url $RPC_URL --keystore $KEYSTORE_PATH --sender $SENDER_ADDRESS --password $KEYSTORE_PASSWORD --broadcast --verify --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY && cd .. && node scripts/update-config.js
